tool_description: An API showing all the shareholders to consider while on prospecting
name: Learning and Growth
title: Learning and Growth

api_list.name: Get All Current Published Start-Ups
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all  updates about newly added Start-Ups to the current website
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://learning-and-growth.p.rapidapi.com/c/sos-communication/ma3056933/kompass"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "learning-and-growth.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://learning-and-growth.p.rapidapi.com/c/sos-communication/ma3056933/{publicationid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "learning-and-growth.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
